title: Introducing: Shivum Sharma
content:
At just eighteen years old, Shivum Sharma is the latest London teenager set to make a name for himself, joining the likes of Chloe Howl, King Krule and Jamie Isaac.

Musically, there’s hints of Isaac in the sparse, piano driven minimalism in Sharma’s music, that slowly evolve into uplifting masterpieces, not too dissimilar to Antony and the Johnsons. Recent track Flicker also draws from James Blake’s debut LP, as well as the likes of Perfume Genius and How To Dress Well. Check out a few of his tracks below, and keep up with Shivum over at Facebook.
